name: Bright Minds Therapy
shortDescription: Specializing in early intervention for dyslexia.
longDescription: Bright Minds Therapy offers expert-level reading and writing support for children with dyslexia, using proven educational strategies.

name: Focus Coaching Center
shortDescription: Helping children with ADHD build focus and confidence.
longDescription: Focus Coaching provides structured programs tailored for ADHD students, improving attention and time management skills.

name: Speech Spark
longDescription: Speech Spark's certified therapists help children with speech delays and articulation disorders gain better communication skills.
